_instructions: This is a template file. Copy this to create your own settings file:
Copy to 'settings-local.json' and remove MONGO_URL fields
Meteor will automatically use local MongoDB (no configuration needed)
Copy to 'settings-production.json' and add your MongoDB Atlas credentials
Or deploy with MONGO_URL environment variable
IMPORTANT: Never commit settings-local.json or settings-production.json to git!

private._comment_mongo: LOCAL: Omit MONGO_URL to use local MongoDB. PRODUCTION: Add MongoDB Atlas connection string
private._comment_seeding: Control demo data seeding on startup
